list.title: AnimationsModule
list.description: Module responsible for handling game animations.Includes card movements, visual effects, and UI transitions.

list.title: AnimationsModule.animateShuffle
list.description: Animates the shuffling of the discard pile back into the draw deck.

list.title: AnimationsModule.triggerVFX
list.description: Triggers a visual effect (particle explosion) at a specific coordinate.

list.title: DESKTOP_BREAKPOINT
list.description:
Módulo para gerenciar o layout dinâmico da aplicação,
adaptando a interface para diferentes tamanhos de tela e orientações.

list.title: Data
list.description:
arenas.js

Define as arenas de batalha do jogo. Cada arena representa uma era ou um
grande movimento filosófico, servindo como "lar" para um conjunto específico
de escolas de pensamento. A progressão pelas arenas guia o jogador através
da história da filosofia.

list.title: Data
list.description:
concepts.js

Este arquivo define o banco de dados dos conceitos filosóficos.
Cada conceito possui um nome, uma breve descrição para fins de jogo,
uma pontuação associada e uma lista de filósofos que o desenvolveram.
Este é o principal recurso que os jogadores usam para pontuar, conectando
o conceito correto ao filósofo em jogo.

list.title: Data
list.description:
philosophers.js

Este arquivo contém o banco de dados principal dos filósofos para o jogo.
Cada filósofo é um objeto com informações essenciais como data de nascimento,
escola filosófica, conceitos-chave e predecessores, permitindo a criação de
mecânicas de jogo complexas como linhas de pensamento e evolução conceitual.

**MODIFICADO:** Adicionada a propriedade `pos` a cada filósofo para layout visual.

list.title: Data
list.description: pinterest_data.jsAuto-generated by scrape_pinterest.pyContains scraped images from Pinterest for "memesbr filosofia".

list.title: Data
list.description: Database of Social Media Posts (Reels).

list.title: Data
list.description:
Shop Data
Contains all shop items including daily deals, chests, and currency packs

list.title: Data
list.description: Study Content for Tales de Mileto (ID: 21)Contains detailed articles, quizzes, and comics for this philosopher.

list.title: Data
list.description: Study Content Database - Index FileThis file aggregates all individual philosopher study content files.Each philosopher has their own file in the study_content/ directory.To add a new philosopher:1. Create a new file in study_content/ (use _template.js as a guide)2. Import it here3. Add it to the STUDY_CONTENT_DATA object with the philosopher's ID as the key

list.title: Data.exports.CARD_DECK_BASE
list.description: Base deck configuration.Contains the definitions for special cards.

list.title: Data.exports.CONCEPTS_DATA
list.description:
Database of Active Concepts (Abilities).
These are special powers players can use during the game.

list.title: Data.exports.CONCEPTS_DATA_1
list.description:
Database of Collectible Concepts.
These are the concepts associated with specific philosophers for collection purposes.

list.title: Data.exports.CardColors
list.description: Enum for Card Colors.

list.title: Data.exports.CardIcons
list.description: SVG Icons for special cards.

list.title: Data.exports.PHILOSOPHERS_DATA
list.description:
Main database of Philosopher cards.
Indexed by unique ID.

list.title: Data.exports.PLAYER_DATA
list.description: Player profile data.Includes names and avatar SVGs.

list.title: Data.exports.STUDY_CONTENT_DATA
list.description: Database of Study Content.Contains detailed articles, quizzes, and comics for each philosopher.

list.title: Data.exports.arenas
list.description:
List of Game Arenas.
Each arena corresponds to a philosophical era or movement.

list.title: Data.exports.gameState
list.description:
Global object tracking the entire state of the game.
Persists player data, resources, timers, and collection status.

list.title: EngineModule
list.description: Core game logic module.Handles card interactions, turn management, scoring, and win conditions.

list.title: EngineModule.advanceTurn
list.description: Advances the game to the next player's turn.Handles status effects (like skipping turns) and triggers opponent AI if applicable.

list.title: EngineModule.applyCardEffect
list.description: Applies any special effects associated with the played card.

list.title: EngineModule.calculateChronologicalScore
list.description: Calculates the score based on the chronological distance between the played card and the last played card.

list.title: EngineModule.checkForWinner
list.description: Checks if the game has ended (deck empty or player hand empty).Determines the winner based on the highest score.

list.title: EngineModule.drawCardFromDeck
list.description: Draws a card from the draw deck.If the deck is empty, it reshuffles the discard pile (excluding the top card) to form a new deck.

list.title: EngineModule.onActivateConcept
list.description: Activates a special concept power for the player.Deducts score cost and executes the concept's handler.

list.title: EngineModule.playCard
list.description: Executes the logic for a player playing a card.Calculates score, triggers animations, updates game state, and advances the turn.

list.title: EngineModule.playerDrawsCard
list.description: Handles the action of the main player drawing a card.Plays sound, triggers animation, and updates the player's hand.

list.title: EngineModule.replenishConceptDeck
list.description: Replenishes the player's concept deck when it runs out.Shuffles available concepts that are not currently in the player's hand.

list.title: EngineModule.simulateOpponentTurn
list.description: Simulates the AI opponent's turn.The AI tries to find the best card to play or draws a card if no good move is available.

list.title: EventsModule
list.description: Module responsible for handling user input and game events.Manages event listeners, pointer interactions, and drag-and-drop logic.

list.title: EventsModule.addListener
list.description: Adds an event listener to an element and tracks it for cleanup.

list.title: EventsModule.bindEventListeners
list.description: Binds all necessary event listeners for the game.Includes UI buttons, keyboard shortcuts, and pointer events.

list.title: EventsModule.cleanupEventListeners
list.description: Removes all registered event listeners.Should be called when the game is destroyed or restarted.

list.title: EventsModule.handleQuit
list.description: Handles the player quitting the game.Calculates partial rewards and redirects to the main menu.

list.title: EventsModule.onPointerDown
list.description: Handles the pointer down event (mouse click or touch start).Initiates card selection or dragging.

list.title: EventsModule.onPointerMove
list.description: Handles the pointer move event.Updates the position of the dragged card clone.

list.title: EventsModule.onPointerUp
list.description: Handles the pointer up event (release).Completes the drag operation, playing the card if dropped on the discard pile.

list.title: EventsModule.startDrag
list.description: Starts the drag operation for a card.Creates a visual clone of the card for dragging.

list.title: EventsModule.togglePause
list.description: Toggles the game pause state.

list.title: FullProfilePopup
list.description: Módulo para o popup de perfil completo do usuário.

list.title: GameModeSelectionPopup.setupListeners

list.title: GameUI
list.description: Main game controller object.Integrates all game modules and manages the game lifecycle.

list.title: GameUI.endGame
list.description: Ends the game and declares a winner.Calculates rewards, saves results, and redirects to the main menu.

list.title: GameUI.init
list.description: Initializes the game.Caches DOM elements and starts the game loop.

list.title: GameUI.restartGame
list.description: Restarts the game session.Resets state, re-renders UI, and starts animations.

list.title: PopupManager#close
list.description: Closes the currently active popup.

list.title: PopupManager#open
list.description: Opens a specific popup with provided data.

list.title: Popups
list.description:
Mapeia os IDs de popup (com namespace) para seus respectivos módulos de implementação.
Cada módulo deve exportar no mínimo os métodos `getHTML(data)` e `setupListeners(element, data)`.

Exemplo de chave: 'tela:nome-do-popup'
Exemplo de valor: o módulo importado.

list.description: Módulo para o popup de seleção de modo de jogo.

list.title: ReelsSettingsPopup.setupListeners

list.title: RendererModule
list.description: Module responsible for rendering the game UI.Handles DOM manipulation and updates based on the game state.

list.title: RendererModule.cacheDOMElements
list.description: Caches DOM elements to improve performance.Should be called during initialization.

list.title: RendererModule.hideTooltip
list.description: Hides the tooltip.

list.title: RendererModule.logEvent
list.description: Logs a game event and updates the log display.

list.title: RendererModule.render
list.description: Main render loop.Updates all dynamic UI elements based on the current game state.

list.title: RendererModule.renderBottomHud
list.description: Renders the bottom HUD, including player hand, concepts, and elixir bar.

list.title: RendererModule.renderCardContent
list.description: Generates the HTML content for a card.

list.title: RendererModule.renderConcepts
list.description: Renders the player's available concept powers.

list.title: RendererModule.renderDeckCounters
list.description: Updates the counters for the draw deck and discard pile.

list.title: RendererModule.renderDiscardPile
list.description: Renders the top card of the discard pile.

list.title: RendererModule.renderElixirBar
list.description: Renders the elixir (score) progress bar.

list.title: RendererModule.renderLog
list.description: Renders the game log messages.

list.title: RendererModule.renderNextConceptPreview
list.description: Renders a preview of the next concept card in the player's deck.

list.title: RendererModule.renderOpponentHands
list.description: Updates the card count display for opponent hands.

list.title: RendererModule.renderPlayerAreas
list.description: Renders the player areas (opponents) on the game board.Positions them in a semi-circle layout.

list.title: RendererModule.renderPlayerHandArc
list.description: Renders the player's hand in an arc layout.Handles card positioning, rotation, and interactivity.

list.title: RendererModule.renderScores
list.description: Updates the score display for all players.

list.title: RendererModule.renderStatusEffects
list.description: Renders active status effects for all players.

list.title: RendererModule.renderTurnIndicator
list.description: Updates the visual indicator for the active player's turn.

list.title: RendererModule.renderUsedPowerIndicators
list.description: Renders indicators for powers used during the current round.

list.title: RendererModule.showRoundSummaryAndReset
list.description: Displays a summary of the round's events (e.g., powers used) and resets round data.

list.title: RendererModule.showTooltip
list.description: Displays a tooltip for a card or element.

list.title: Utils
list.description: Utility functions for the game.

list.title: Utils.shuffleArray
list.description: Shuffles an array in place using a random sort.Note: This is a simple shuffle and may not be perfectly random for large datasets.

list.title: gameState.collection
list.description: The player's collection of cards/philosophers.

list.title: gameState.timers
list.description: Active timers for chests and other time-based events.

list.title: handleResize
list.description:
Lida com o redimensionamento da janela.
Adiciona ou remove classes CSS com base nas dimensões da tela.

list.title: initLayoutManager
list.description: Inicializa o gerenciador de layout.

list.title: isDesktopView
list.description: Verifica se a largura da viewport atual corresponde a uma visualização de desktop.

list.title: module:Screens/Library
list.description:
Inicializa a tela da Biblioteca (Árvore do Conhecimento).
Estrutura os dados, cria a trilha de aprendizado visual e atualiza a UI.

list.title: module:Screens/Library.handleLibraryScreenClick
list.description:
Lida com cliques na tela da biblioteca.
Gerencia a abertura e fechamento do mini-card de lição e a navegação para o estudo.

list.title: module:Screens/Login
list.description: Login Screen Logic.Handles the login form submission and user authentication.

list.title: module:Screens/Philosophers
list.description:
Initializes the Philosophers Collection Screen.
Renders the grid of collected and undiscovered philosopher cards.

list.title: module:Screens/Philosophers.handlePhilosophersScreenClick
list.description:
Handles click events on the Philosophers Screen.
Opens detailed views for discovered philosophers.

list.title: module:Screens/Play
list.description: Initializes the Play Screen (Main Debate Arena).Sets up the arena background and name based on the current level.

list.title: module:Screens/Play.handlePlayScreenClick
list.description: Função principal que trata os cliques na tela de menu.

list.title: module:Screens/Reels
list.description:
Initializes the Reels Screen.
Triggers the rendering of the reels feed.

list.title: module:Screens/Reels.handleReelsScreenClick
list.description:
Handles click and tap events on the Reels Screen.
Supports double-tap to like, and buttons for like, comment, and share.

list.title: module:Screens/SchoolMembers
list.description:
Initializes the School Members Screen.
Sets the title, renders members and posts, and sets up tab navigation.

list.title: module:Screens/SchoolMembers.handleSchoolMembersScreenClick
list.description:
Handles click events on the School Members Screen.
Manages interactions with member cards and post profiles.

list.title: module:Screens/Schools
list.description:
Initializes the Schools Screen.
Currently only updates the dynamic UI.

list.title: module:Screens/Schools.handleSchoolsScreenClick
list.description:
Handles click events on the Schools Screen.
Manages navigation to specific school member lists.

list.title: module:Screens/Shop
list.description:
Initializes the Shop Screen.
Renders daily deals, chests, and currency packs.

list.title: module:Screens/Symposium
list.description:
Initializes the Symposium Screen.
Currently a placeholder for future event functionality.

list.title: module:Screens/Symposium.handleSymposiumScreenClick
list.description: Handles click events on the Symposium Screen.

list.title: module:Services/Auth

list.title: module:Services/Auth.logout
list.description: Logs out the current user.

list.title: module:Services/Auth.subscribeToAuthChanges
list.description: Subscribes to auth state changes.

list.title: module:Services/Database
list.description: Database Service.Handles saving and loading user data and game progress to Firestore.

list.title: module:Services/Database.loadGameProgress
list.description: Loads the user's game progress.

list.title: module:Services/Database.saveGameProgress
list.description: Saves the current game state.

list.title: module:Services/Database.saveUserProfile
list.description: Saves or updates the user's basic profile information.

list.title: preloadAdjacentImages
list.description: Pré-carrega as imagens do reel adjacente (próximo e anterior).

list.title: renderMembers
list.description: Renderiza os cards dos membros da escola.

list.title: renderPosts
list.description: Renderiza as postagens (reels) da escola.

list.title: renderReels
list.description: Renderiza todos os reels (imagens) na tela com Skeletons e Lazy Loading.

list.title: setupImageObserver
list.description: Configura Intersection Observer para lazy loading e preloading de imagens.

list.title: setupReelsObserver
list.description: Configura um Intersection Observer para tocar/pausar vídeos de reels quando entram/saem da tela.

list.title: setupZoom
list.description: Configura a funcionalidade de Pinch-to-Zoom para as imagens dos reels.

list.title: showLikeAnimation
list.description: Mostra a animação de coração no centro da imagem.

list.title: toggleLike
list.description: Lógica para curtir/descurtir um post.

list.title: toggleSidebar
list.description: Alterna a visibilidade da barra lateral.
